Detailed Description

Testing module for creating traces. Used for testing an RTOS.

NOTE: Traces are stored in string like this

T001;1;2;3;1235

CSC 460/560 Real Time Operating Systems - Mantis Cheng

Author:
Scott Craig

Justin Tanner
